DOC.brief_summary: This study placebo-controlled study ass safety tolerability novel antipsychotic medication , ( 773812 ) give schizophrenic patient twenty-eight day . Assessments include blood sample determine drug concentration , psychiatric assessment treatment , movement assessment evaluate potential side effect .
DOC.criteria: Must schizophrenia stable least three month . Willing discontinue current antipsychotic medication ( supervision ) prior study . Willing live study center total 38 day return three followup visit . Taking medication condition schizophrenia . History alcohol drug abuse within six month study , alcohol consumption must meet moderate guideline .
